content: p1 pm/sm k to bor setup- sl1 k14 16 18 20 ssk k1 turn round 2 p1 k1 2 3 4 5 times p1 k6 p1 k1 3 sl1 p3 p2tog p1 turn times p1 k6 p1 k1 2 3 4 5 times p1 k to bor round 3 p1 k1 2 3 4 5 times p1 k1 rt 2 row 1 sl1 k to 1 before the gap ssk k1 turn times k1 p1 k1 4 times rt 2 times k1 p1 3 4 row 2 sl1 p to 1 before the gap p2tog p1 turn 5 6 times k to bor continue to work row 1 and row 2 until all round 4 repeat round 2 stitches have been worked end after completing repeat row 1-4 until leg reaches desired length it a row 2 break cc leaving tail long enough to does not matter what round you end on just be sure weave in end to make yourself a note so you know what row you will be on after you work the heel 4 of 6 instructions pattern repeat reference round 1 p1 k1 2 3 4 5 times p1 rt 3 times p1 k1 3 times p1 rt 3 times p1 k1 2 3 4 5 times p1 pm/sm k to bor round 2 p1 k1 2 3 4 5 times p1 k6 p1 k1 3 times p1 k6 p1 k1 2 3 4 5 times p1 k to bor round 3 p1 k1 2 3 4 5 times p1 k1 rt 2 times k1 p1 k1 4 times rt 2 times k1 p1 3 4 5 6 times k to bor round 4 repeat round 2 pick up heel stitches foot we will now be working in the continue to work top of foot stitches in established pattern and bottom of foot round again stitches in stockinette pick up mc at the end of the repeat until foot reaches 1 5 3 75cm top of foot stitches shorter than total desired length pick up 1 stitch in the corner on your last row knit top of foot in between top of foot stitches pattern to 2 stitches before m k2tog sm k and heel flap to bor pick up 14 16 18 20 stitches you will now have 56 64 72 80 stitches on heel flap edge 28 32 36 40 stitches for each top of foot k across heel turn stitches and bottom of foot stitches pick up 14 16 18 20 stitches toe on the other side of the heel flap edge break mc join cc pick up one stitch in the corner k 1 round even between heel flap and bor marker round 1 k1 ssk k1 across to 3 st before m work top of foot stitches in pattern to m sm ktbl 15 k2tog k1 sm k1 ssk k to 3 st before bor m k2tog k 17 19 21 stitches k across heel turn stitches ktbl 15 17
